meanings.definition: Relating to or located near the trochanter, especially the greater trochanter of the femur.
meanings.sent1: The trochanteric region of the femur is important for hip movement.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sharp pain in her trochanteric hip area.
meanings.sent3: The trochanteric dance move involved a lot of hip swaying.
meanings.sent4: Her trochanteric grace on the dance floor was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The trochanteric bump on the bone was clearly visible in the X-ray.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the trochanteric bursa, a fluid-filled sac near the hip joint.
meanings.sent1: The trochanteric bursa helps cushion the hip joint during movement.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended exercises to strengthen the trochanteric area.
meanings.sent3: The trochanteric bursa decided to take a day off from its cushioning duties.
meanings.sent4: Her trochanteric bursa was like a protective bubble around her hip joint.
meanings.sent5: The trochanteric bursa swelled up after the fall, causing discomfort.

meanings.definition: A trochanteric fracture, a break in the femur near the trochanter.
meanings.sent1: The trochanteric fracture required surgery to heal properly.
meanings.sent2: He was in a lot of pain due to the trochanteric break in his leg.
meanings.sent3: The trochanteric fracture made walking feel like a jigsaw puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The trochanteric fracture was a roadblock in his marathon training.
meanings.sent5: The trochanteric fracture sounded like a thunderclap in the silent room.
